trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objetos em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridItemCollection class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects, which in turn represent the data items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataGridItemCollection representa uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objetos, que por sua vez, representam os itens de dados em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, use one of following methods: - Use the indexer to get a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the collection, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar programaticamente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objetos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlar, use um dos seguintes métodos:-Use o indexador para obter um único <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objeto da coleção, usando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection to a <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar o conteúdo da coleção para um <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, que pode ser usado para obter itens da coleção.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>interface, que pode ser usado para obter itens da coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A> property specifies the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A>propriedade especifica o número total de itens na coleção e é comumente usada para determinar o limite superior da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains the items with which to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> que contém os itens com a qual inicializar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens neste <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref> coleção especificado <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, começando no índice especificado no <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para copiar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>coleção especificado <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, começando no índice especificado.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O `array` parâmetro deve ser <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> com base em zero

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: A primeira posição do <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> para receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Count para determinar o número de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count é normalmente usada ao fazer a iteração pela coleção para determinar o limite superior da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementado o objeto que contém todas a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that can be iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para criar um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementado um objeto que pode ser iterado por meio para obter cada item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>apontada propriedade para obter o item atualmente na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover para o próximo item na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to its initial position.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover o enumerador como sua posição inicial.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After you create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Depois de criar um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementou o objeto ou use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover o enumerador para o primeiro item na coleção, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item é representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementado o objeto que contém todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref> coleção pode ser modificada.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade sempre retorna `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>coleção pode ser gravada em todos os casos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref> coleção é sincronizada (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é derivada de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface e é substituído para sempre retornar `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>coleção no índice especificado, usando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> para recuperar da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: O objeto retornado nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>objeto propriamente dito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.
